About

About Me

I am Mateo Jacques, a Cancer Epidemiologist with a focus on the intersection of epidemiology, HIV-associated malignancies, and public health. My research uses machine learning and longitudinal data analysis to generate insights that improve cancer outcomes, especially in vulnerable populations.

I earned my MD from ITESM and advanced my training with an MPH and ScM from top institutions, currently pursuing a PhD in Epidemiology. Outside of academia, I enjoy exploring interdisciplinary collaborations and applying analytics to real-world health challenges‚Äî
